lead_paragraph: Black men playing basketball and football for the country’s top teams are graduating at lower rates than other black male students at the same colleges.

headline.main: Low Graduation Rates Among Black Athletes

snippet: Black men playing basketball and football for the country’s top teams are graduating at lower rates than other black male students at the same colleges.
abstract: Study shows black male college basketball and football players, who receive significant financial and academic support, have lower graduation rate than non-athlete black men at same schools.
